subject: Combine textui and swingui advantages?
msgSnippet: Is there any way to run tests using the junit.swingui.TestRunner with having the short summary of found errors and falures in my console (e.g. Messages Log in
messageBody:
Is there any way to run tests using the junit.swingui.TestRunner with
having the short summary of found errors and falures in my console
(e.g. Messages Log in JDeveloper), like as using
junit.textui.TestRunner?
In other words, how to have swingui and textui both?
